trans-unit.source: What's New in Business Central | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: What's New in Business Central | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Co je nového v Business Central | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: How to get the latest news and updates for Business Central.

seg-source.mrk: How to get the latest news and updates for Business Central.

target.mrk: Jak získat nejnovější zprávy a aktualizace pro Business Central.

trans-unit.source: What's New in Dynamics 365 Business Central

seg-source.mrk: What's New in Dynamics 365 Business Central

target.mrk: Co je nového v Dynamics 365 Business Central

trans-unit.source: This page points you to topics that can help you learn about the new features in the latest versions of [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: This page points you to topics that can help you learn about the new features in the latest versions of [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

target.mrk: Tato stránka ukazuje na témata, která vám mohou pomoci dozvědět se o nových funkcích v nejnovějších verzích [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If you haven't already, then sign up for a [trial](https://trials.dynamics.com/), get introduced to the basics of what you can do with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], and then try things out on your own for a while.

seg-source.mrk: If you haven't already, then sign up for a [trial](https://trials.dynamics.com/), get introduced to the basics of what you can do with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], and then try things out on your own for a while.

target.mrk: Pokud jste tak ještě neučinili, zaregistrujte se na [zkoušku](https://trials.dynamics.com/), seznamte se se základy, které můžete v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] dělat a poté si aplikaci na chvíli vyzkoušíte sami.

trans-unit.source: When you are ready, you can open a blank company and set things up for yourself.

seg-source.mrk: When you are ready, you can open a blank company and set things up for yourself.

target.mrk: Až budete připraveni, můžete otevřít prázdnou společnost a připravit si všechno pro sebe.

trans-unit.source: On a regular basis, we will update [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] with additional capabilities in the core application and with new [extensions](ui-extensions.md).

seg-source.mrk: On a regular basis, we will update [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] with additional capabilities in the core application and with new [extensions](ui-extensions.md).

target.mrk: Pravidelně budeme aktualizovat [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] s dalšími funkcemi v základní aplikaci a novými [rozšířeními](ui-extensions.md).
Podívejte se na blog Business Central

trans-unit.source: We also talk about new capabilities on [the Business Central blog](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/financials/), including when they are made available, and if there are special considerations.

seg-source.mrk: We also talk about new capabilities on [the Business Central blog](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/financials/), including when they are made available, and if there are special considerations.

target.mrk: Hovoříme také o nových možnostech na [blogu Business Central](https://community.dynamics.com/business/b/financials/), včetně toho, kdy jsou zpřístupněny, a pokud existují speciální požadavky.
